reviews: This app is just a gateway to advertising. It is useless and all it does is link you to their facebook page, their website and other useless websites about india.

I read the dozens of articles about the agricultural farming on twitter earlier. I am very clear to say that a wonderful job. Actually I did not find such a site before. Very scientific, informative and useful. Keep going. Thanks!

Nice app. Informative and gives you new ideas to start a farming business. It gives solutions to all the problems faced by the farmers and even gardeners. Thank u for such an innotive yet excellent information.
